nodes.text: Ralchio Nervi, born Ralchio Sargan, was a human male captain in the naval forces of the Galactic Empire who was in command of a task force that consisted of the Blood Ambition, the Sargantuan, and the Warhawk. He fought in the Battle of Xorrn, and coordinated his fleet with his ground forces led by Lieutenant Colonel Erle Hovlinn.

Nervi was Force-sensitive, although he kept that secret to himself. The officer married Lilva Nervi and took her name in wanting to obtain more social influence, shortly before attending the Rengali Imperial Naval Academy. He graduated with mediocre marks, but held records for winning head-to-head combat simulations. Having became married to a Lilva, Ralchio Nervi used this leverage to attain a promotion under Moff Ravik. It was rumored that the Imperial kept mistresses, however.
